CatDescriptText: Edward Shaw, tailor, 6484 Frankstown Avenue, Democrat, 12th Ward, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 7, 1957, pg. 3 with question: "Who is your Ward Chairman? Does he have any power? Does he exert it?" Answer reads: "I don't know who the ward chairman is. Therefore I don't know about his power because I don't know him . I haven't met him because neither of us have put ourselves oft to get acquainted."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Edward Shaw wearing striped mesh sweater, posed in interior with telephone on table and door in background
